titles.title: A bill to extend the deadlines applicable to certain hydroelectric projects under the Federal Power Act, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources

action.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Water and Power.

bill.summary: 3/22/1994--Introduced. Directs the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission, upon certain licensees request, to extend the time required for commencement of construction of specified hydroelectric projects.
